data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Kerguelen, French Southern Territories that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kerguelen, French Southern Territories
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Kerguelen, French Southern Territories to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kerguelen that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Kerguelen against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Port-aux-Français
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Port-aux-Français, Kerguelen, French Southern Territories.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Kerguelen
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Kerguelen to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kerguelen, French Southern Territories has a population of 100.

We estimate Kerguelen has 4 people who might know Jesus, 90 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Kerguelen, French Southern Territories to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
